page.title: 07ATTITUDES
page.content: I'm Joanne Merchant, I am 13, and I have just moved to{Bishopston}from where I used to live in{Port Talbot. {Bishopston}is a largish village in {South Gower,}on the South coast of {Wales,}it has not much to do sometimes especially in the nights when not much goes on. In school we have different subjects including Maths, English, History, Geography, Sciences etc. I have a few lessons I like best: English, Biology and maybe Welsh. School is quite big and I am in 2B, we (girls) play hockey, the reason? because we have to! {Bishopston}is mainly boring even though it has nice surroundings, the school has a Youth Club every Wednesday but it is mostly the older pupils that go. jOANNE MERCHANT 2B
